short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered Chrome extension for LinkedIn insights, personalized questions, and activity tracking

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that provides in-depth insights on any LinkedIn profile through our dedicated AI ðŸ§  and integrates seamlessly with your CRM.

It adds a question box in the bottom left corner, allowing you to ask personalized questions like:
- Get an introduction: "Who from my clients could introduce me to this person and why?"
- Make a pitch: "What should I highlight to persuade them to consider my solution?"
- Uncover insights: "Do they currently use a meeting recording solution?"
- Assess fit: "Would they be a good match for my job opening?"

With CRM integration, any profile insights and historical queries are automatically synchronized, giving you a full picture of past interactions and tailored suggestions. This extension also includes a search history feature to revisit previous queries, while prompt customization lets you tailor questions to your needs. Ideal for sales professionals, CEOs, investors, and recruiters!

Premium features are coming soon, enabling you to follow profiles and receive real-time notifications about their activities, such as likes, reactions, posts, and company engagements.
